data.title: Trailhead
data.content:
The fun way to learn anything about Salesforce platform and apps.
 Also win some astro dolls.

data.title: Where is Astro?
data.content: Aastro can be found somwhere on  Trailhead Quest route.

data.title: Dreamforce Jetpack
data.content: What is Dreamforce jetpack? It is set of media content you can view and read on the  airplane ride to DF16.

data.title: My Trailblazer Story
data.content: Tell a story how you learn Salesforce with Trailhead badges and become an expert developer.

data.title: Salesforce Einstein
data.content:
Salesforce Einstein is new AI that makes your CRM learn your habits and become smarter overtime. 
 May be too smart one day smarter than its users.

data.title: Community Builder
data.content: Visual tool to edit adn build content for community pages.

data.title: Lightning Design System
data.content: A design CSS/HTML framework enebles developers build web apps that have Lightning designs and styles.

data.title: Lightning Components
data.content: Portable components built with JavaScript, CSS and APEX to add functionality and build new innovative apps.
